main event: Observers reported seeing a bright flash in the sky described as 'a ball of fire' which moved erratically and then disappeared.
interesting points: The event lasted approximately 5 minutes., The sighting was reported by several observers aboard the USNS Harris County., Initial assessment of the object was recorded as 'Probable Aircraft'., A naval message described a bluish-white flash with no determinable shape., Duration of the flash sighting was approximately 1 to 1.5 seconds.
sighted object: a ball of fire and a bluish-white flash
witness description: Several observers from the USNS Harris County.
